short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download images as square PNG files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Square Image Downloader - Auto-Crop & Convert

A simple yet powerful tool that transforms any image into a perfectly squared PNG with just one click! Perfect for social media profiles, thumbnails, and digital art preservation.

Key Features:
• Automatically squares any image while maintaining the original content
• Intelligently removes excess white space and borders
• Centers the image content perfectly
• Converts any image format (including WEBP, JPG, GIF) to high-quality PNG
• Adds minimal padding around the content for perfect presentation
• Works directly from the right-click menu
• Free and easy to use

How to Use:
1. Right-click on any image you find on the web
2. Select "Download as Square PNG"
3. Your perfectly squared image will be automatically downloaded

Perfect for:
• Social media profile pictures
• Digital artists
• Content creators
• Web developers
• Anyone needing quick image formatting

Note: Some websites may restrict image downloading due to their security settings.

This extension respects your privacy and requires minimal permissions to function.
